modShortDescription: Adds five fully animated and functional electrical switches to allow for more variety in switches for different base themes or such.
modDescription:
Adds five fully animated and functional electrical switches to allow for more variety in switches for different base themes or such.

My mods typically seek to add more variety to the game rather than add or remove existing functions.

Requires [electrical](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-electricity/) basics to craft just like regular switch.

All 3D models were bought by and licensed to me, smittylv.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15vNqQVzA7afqd96U23CCnvccyjYXJM-T/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** [smittylv](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/smittylv/), 3D Models by Lopper\_Petro
